overview: Young, handsome and charming, Vito, a very much narcissistic playboy must choose between love and lust when faced with losing everything, including his own life. Married but single, he doesn't play by the rules. It's his way or no way! But when he meets his match, Camille, young and heartless with no boundaries, he realizes she doesn't play by any rules at all.
title: Deceitful Passions
